text: Eschede (Pronunciation according to Duden) is a municipality in Celle, in Lower Saxony, Germany. About 15 km northeast of Celle, Eschede is at the border of the SÃ¼dheide Nature Park, a protected area of large forests and heaths. Today around 20 small villages are part of the "Gemeinde Eschede". ==Sister town== * Barneville-Carteret, Manche, Normandy, France == References == == Other websites == * Eschede Official Website * Category:Celle (district)
